txt.en: With the teachings learned along the Path of the Martial Champion, you will find absorbing and redirecting your foe's blows easier, allowing you to serve your companions better in a prolonged fight.
The Path of the Martial Champion
You have begun to follow the Path of the Martial Champion. Mastery of the arts found along this path will allow you to suffer the most cruel attacks and remain in the fight.
Begin down the Path of the Martial Champion
With the teachings learned along the Path of the Martial Champion, you will find absorbing and redirecting your foe's blows easier, allowing you to serve your companions better in a prolonged fight.
